flawed_nl_solution:
Dana has 15 more pencils than Jayden who has 20, so Dana has 20+15 = <<20+15=35>>35 pencils
Jayden has 20 pencils which is twice as much as Marcus's so Marcus has 20/2 = <<20/2=10>>10 pencils
Dana has 35-10 = <<35-10=20>>20 more pencils than Marcus

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 25, not 20. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
